title: TOXCI PLAYER IN MY GAMERS PLEASDE BAN HIM
body:
I HAVE BEEN IN MY PROMOS GAMES AND IN 2 IN A ROW NOW TOXIN PLAYER BUY NAME OF "NIJI" IS FEEDING IN BOTH RUNNIN DOWNS MID SAYING i DO NUT DESERVE TO BE HIHGER ELO

I HAVE HAD ENUF OF ROITS INABILITY TO GET THIOS UNDER CONTROL, UNTIL PLAYER "NIJI" IS BAND I REFUSE TO SPEND ANOTHER CENT ON TIS GAMe
